## Natural history notes

The Le Conte's Flatsedge (Cyperus lecontei) is a species of sedge that is native to south eastern parts of the United States. It is typically found in wet pine savannas, bogs, and seasonally wet flatwoods. As a native sedge, it contributes to wetland biodiversity, providing cover and food for insects, birds, and small mammals.
